title: The planning, design and construction of any building under S
clause_text: The planning, design and construction of any building under S.R.S. shall be such as to ensure safety from fire. For this purpose, the provisions of the Maharashtra Fire Prevention and Life Safety Act, 2006 and the relevant provisions of the National Building Code 2005, as amended from time to time, shall apply.
